sentences.en: Andrew has been left wheelchair-bound after the accident.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁在那次事故后就只能呆在轮椅上了。

sentences.en: Constant wheelchair use will scuff almost any floor surface.
sentences.cn: 任何地板上经常有轮椅走动几乎都会有所磨损。

sentences.en: Does the hotel have wheelchair access ?
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆有轮椅通道吗？

sentences.en: He had been confined to a wheelchair since childhood.
He is now quadriplegic and confined to a wheelchair.
sentences.cn: 现在的他四肢麻痹，只能呆在轮椅上。
半步离不开轮椅对她的束缚

sentences.en: His bad leg condemned him to a wheelchair.
sentences.cn: 他的残腿使他离不开轮椅.

sentences.en: Lynn has been confined to a wheelchair (= has had to use a wheelchair ) for the last year.
sentences.cn: 过去一年中林恩都被困在轮椅上。

sentences.en: Many new trains have space for wheelchair users.
sentences.cn: 许多新型列车为坐轮椅者留有空间。

sentences.en: Ramps should be provided for wheelchair users.
sentences.cn: 应该给轮椅使用者提供坡道。

sentences.en: She has been able to cast aside ( = stop using ) her wheelchair.
sentences.cn: 她能 丟掉 轮椅了.

sentences.en: She was sitting in her newly-acquired wheelchair.
sentences.cn: 她正坐在新买的轮椅上。
坐轮椅人士的专用停车位

sentences.en: The facilities have been adapted to give access to wheelchair users.
sentences.cn: 这些设施已经改造过以方便轮椅使用者进入。

sentences.en: The person can transfer from wheelchair to seat with relative ease.
sentences.cn: 那个人可以比较轻松地从轮椅上移到座位上。
该场所轮椅可以自由出入。

sentences.en: The wheelchair tennis player is allowed two bounces of the ball.
sentences.cn: 轮椅网球选手可以等球落地两次再击球。

trans.tran_en: a chair with wheels, used by people who cannot walk
